titleStmt.title: mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa lung gi dpag bsam rgyan 'gyur gyi tshal
titleStmt.author: bzang ldan pa dkon mchog grags

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: kha 1 na re ding sang ston pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin gyi gsung ba ma yin no zhe na |
lo ts+tsha ba chen po na re | slob dpon seng ge bzang pos 'dir | ji skad bshad pa ni | med dang shin tu mi mthun pas 'khrul pa yin par bdag gis skyes so || zhes gsung ngo ||
dpang lo na re | 'di dag legs sbyar gyi skad la thams cad chos brjod du mod kyang | bod skad du bsgyur ba na | de rnams de'i ngo bos stong zhes pa lta bu chen brjod par byung skad gsungs so |

bcom ldan rigs ral na re | de ltar na | yon tan nyi shu rtsa brgyad du thal gsungs pa shin tu med doThe context suggests 'med do' but the manuscript has the abbreviation 'mdo' rather than 'medo' | des na phyi ma la bcu ba dang | snga ma la bcu ba ni | rgyun dang rgyun can du sbyar ba yin
gyi rgyu 'bras ma yin no ||

bu ston rin po che'i zhal ta nas mdzad pa'i rnaM bshad lung gi snye ma dang | de nyid chan nyid kyis mdzad pa dang gsung sgros dharma'i mtshan can gyis phyogs gcig tu bkod pa'i zin ris nas snangs rnaMs ba'i de nyid las khong du chud par bya bas 'dir ma bris
shing spyi don gyi gnas rnaMs na rgal zhing rtag pa bya ba mang du snang na yang | blo gsal 'jug pa bde ba'i don du re zhig 'dir bskus pa'o ||

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogsstoGS pa rgyan gyi dka' 'grel lung gi dpag bsam rgyas 'gyur gyi tshal zhes bya ba 'di ni | yongs 'dzin du mas nye bar bskyangs shing | khyad par du rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin
pa rigs pa dang grol bar smra ba'i yongs ba bsaM gyis mi khyab pa la mnga' rnyes pas | 'chad'tshad pa dang rtsod pa dang | rtsoM pa'i tshul la zla dang bral ba gangs can gyi bka' bzhi 'dzin pa gcig po nyid du nges pa | brtson 'grus dpal gyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing | de nyid las chos 'di'i tshul la bloslo'i snang ba cung zad skyes pa | shAkya' btsunbcun pa
pa dkon mchog grags kyis ston pa'i rgyal tshab daM pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas dpal sa skya'i chos gra dang nye ba'i sar sbyar ba re shig rdzogs so ||
